about.name: Alexander Kharytonov
about.summary: Disciplined and detail-oriented Frontend Engineer with 12+ years in HTML/CSS and 6+ years in JavaScript development. Specialized in building responsive, pixel-perfect interfaces using React, TypeScript, and modern UI libraries. Strong experience in Agile teams and cross-functional collaboration.
